$:/plugins/tiddlywiki/internals/EditTemp.title: $:/plugins/tiddlywiki/internals/EditTemplate/body/preview/parse-tree
$:/plugins/tiddlywiki/internals/EditTemp.caption: parse tree
$:/plugins/tiddlywiki/internals/EditTemp.text:
\define preview(mode) <$wikify name="preview-text" text={{!!text}} type={{!!type}} mode="$mode$" output="parsetree"> 

<$text text=<>/>
\end {{||$:/plugins/tiddlywiki/internals/EditTemplate/body/preview/shared}}

$:/plugins/tiddlywiki/internals/EditTemp.title: $:/plugins/tiddlywiki/internals/EditTemplate/body/preview/shared
$:/plugins/tiddlywiki/internals/EditTemp.text:
\define body() Mode: <$select tiddler="$(tv-mode-configuration)$" default="block"> <$macrocall $name="preview" mode={{$(tv-mode-configuration)$}}/> \end
<$vars tv-mode-configuration=<>> <>

$:/plugins/tiddlywiki/internals/EditTemp.title: $:/plugins/tiddlywiki/internals/EditTemplate/body/preview/widget-tree
$:/plugins/tiddlywiki/internals/EditTemp.caption: widget tree
$:/plugins/tiddlywiki/internals/EditTemp.text:
\define preview(mode) <$wikify name="preview-text" text={{!!text}} type={{!!type}} mode="$mode$" output="widgettree"> 

<$text text=<>/>
\end {{||$:/plugins/tiddlywiki/internals/EditTemplate/body/preview/shared}}

$:/plugins/tiddlywiki/internals/readme.title: $:/plugins/tiddlywiki/internals/readme
$:/plugins/tiddlywiki/internals/readme.text:
This plugin adds features to help explore the internals of TiddlyWiki:

* New preview panes showing:
** the parse tree
** the widget tree
** the raw HTML output

The first two include a dropdown for choosing block vs. inline parsing mode.

$:/plugins/tiddlywiki/internals/styles.title: $:/plugins/tiddlywiki/internals/styles
$:/plugins/tiddlywiki/internals/styles.text: \rules only filteredtranscludeinline transcludeinline macrodef macrocallinline macrocallblock
